mapper.sql: ${alias}.acs_num as ${prefix}acs_num, ${alias}.act_num as ${prefix}act_num, ${alias}.user_num as ${prefix}user_num, ${alias}.status as ${prefix}status, D19(${alias}.start_date) as ${prefix}start_date, D19(${alias}.end_date) as ${prefix}end_date
mapper.select:
select
from activity_set activitySet where acs_num=#{acsNum}
